name: Arch Druid
description: The most powerful nature mage among the Fae, commanding the very essence of the forest. Can heal allies, entangle enemies, and summon treants.

abilities.name: Entangling Roots
abilities.description: Causes roots to burst from the ground, immobilizing and damaging an enemy.

abilities.name: Tranquility
abilities.description: Channels healing energy to restore health to all nearby friendly units.

abilities.name: Force of Nature
abilities.description: Converts a group of trees into treants that fight for the Arch Druid.

abilities.name: Thorns Aura
abilities.description: Passive: Returns damage to melee attackers.
